content: Well put! The only thing I disagree with (and there had to be something) is “Success mostly comes to those who work for it.” I believe “Success mostly comes to those who meditate for it.” The word “work” implies physical or even mental action when, in fact, sometimes the smartest thing I can do is absolutely nothing. Doing something is always easier. A smart man once told me, “Don’t just do something…STAND THERE!!” And he couldn’t have been more right.
